column5: Seeing as how I am a huge Football fan... and college football is more entertaining then the NFL (fewer premadonnas) I just want to know where OFC'rs loyalties lay...  my vote is for the Wolverines!!! Go Mich Go!
I dont think so..... lol.... NOTHING is gonna get in Ohio States way.....please.......      i like "blue" too,   but man, State is  GOOD     the Big 10 IS GOOD.......who knows
Was a great game anyway you slice it! Was hoping for a Mich win but it didn't work out, Bo would still be proud.
it was a great game!!! wow!... I was bleeding blue... too bad it didnt go in their favor... I think it could have easily went either way..  Ahhh well...  And Yes RIP Bo.    Gerritt.
Looks as though Michigan will stay number 2 in the national rankings.

Sad loss for Michigan but they still deserve the second national championship spot. They lost to #1 on the road by 3, they spanked Notre Dame earlier this season and USC lost to a much weaker team. That is my opinion but I think they will get screwed out of it and end up in the Rose Bowl. Either way a great game to watch today! Rest in Peace BO!
Sorry Gerritt but all is good in Whopperville!  OSU 42 That Team up North 39  Buckeyes the Next National Champions!  Whopper
big ten and national champs plus a heisman trophy.
all I saw was the first offensive series for each team...touchdowns for both.  Sounds like it was entertaining the whole way through
Great game, sad to see the Wolverines lose though.  Hope there is a rematch for the championship too come Jan.  RIP Bo.

That was a classic of a game!     I have been a huge buckeyes fan since the days of eddie george, terry glenn and joey galloway!  I too would like to see a rematch in the BCS championship game, although if Rutgers wins out, I think they should go.  Michigan IMO is better than any other 1 loss team.  Rutgers is a HUGE surprise, but they beat Louisville a few weeks back, so they must be for "real".

by far the best game of the season, it lived up to all of the hype.  i agree that the team up north should get a rematch, but i dont think the powers that be will allow it for some crazy reason.  ohio state should have alot easier game for the championship.  Go Bucks!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Rutgers met reality in Cincinnati last night against a so so University of Cincinnati team.  I appreciated the class of both teams yesterday in Columbus.   No wolfing.  No shucking and jiving.  Just great effort and team play by both teams.  I hope the Monday papers don't have any post game violence to report coming from Ann Arbor or Columbus.

I'll pose a question here. After hearing a lot of peoples opinions about how the Wolverines should get a rematch does that mean if Ohio State would have lost yesterday that the would have automaticly played for a national title?  IMHO don't thinks so.   Whopper   UC's win last night was huge for their program.
The only football I watch anymore OSU! As it turned out the pick four lottery winning number here that day was 4239, LOL the fix was in? Great game they kept it interesting!
